ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | scmatval.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | scmatval.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | scmatval.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | scmatval.1 | |- .1. = ( 1r ` A ) |
| 5 |  | scmatval.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` A ) |
| 6 |  | scmatval.s | |- S = ( N ScMat R ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_scmatel | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> ( M e. S <-> ( M e. B /\ E. c e. K M = ( c .x. .1. ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_simplbda | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) /\ M e. S ) -> E. c e. K M = ( c .x. .1. ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3impa | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V /\ M e. S ) -> E. c e. K M = ( c .x. .1. ) ) |
